body:
Comment 2: 
There is a bug triggered by the NoDeadlock test that you submitted, and I'm still
working on that.

However, the Deadlock case you sent will never work. You're only allowed to use one end
of a channel you give to netchan, and it will only behave correctly if you give a
channel to only one Importer or Exporter.  I'd diagnose this in the API if I knew how.
